summary.para: The module contained in the DevExpress.ExpressApp.Validation.Win.v15.2.dll assembly.
Creates an instance of the ValidationWindowsFormsModule class.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.Validation.Win.ValidationWindowsFormsModule.GetModuleUpdaters(DevExpress.ExpressApp.IObjectSpace,System.Version)

summary.para: Returns the list of updaters that handle database updates for the ValidationWindowsFormsModule module.

member.param: An object which is the Object Space used to update the database.
A System.Version object which represents the current database version.
member.returns: An IEnumerable<> list of updaters that handle database updates for the ValidationWindowsFormsModule module.
